<title level="1" right="Trait">[Metropolis](/Traits.aspx?ID=283)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 253</row>

Settlements with this trait are the largest of cities, often with a level of 8 or higher.
name: Metropolis
